input.sentences: parade day ! a good view of the route .
smokey the bear was in the parade !
lots of local and kids groups ...
was some really cool old cars too ...
finished off the parade with emergency vehicles .
output.sentences: Today we have a great view of the middle of the parade route!
A lot of great floats went by, including Smokey the Bear!
I feel like every local kid walked in this parade with one group or another.
There was also this amazing long line of cool vintage cars!
The parade concluded with emergency vehicles, which is great but what if there were an actual fire somewhere in town?
